Directory containing all shapefiles needed

Output debug control
output files used for SMOKE

This is a grid name for output area.

Output grid projection ellipsoid for the grid.
It is the name of a Shapefile in the Shapefile catalog that contains the output shapes (e.g. census tracts) or it is the name of an arcinfo polygon text file with projection description in GRIDDESC
Directory for individual surrogate files
name and path for the final merged surrogate file output from srgtool
file with surrogate codes and description
Users can choose YES to overwrite the individual and total output surrogate ratio files
log file to store all information from running the program
surrogate ratio is output as comment line with # sign if denominator of surrogate ratio computation is less than the threshold
It can be YES or NO.  If YES is selected, srgcreate is called to compute surrogates.
It can be YES or NO.  If YES is selected, SurrogateTools.jar is called to merge surrogates.
It can be YES or NO.  If YES is selected, SUrrogateTools.jar is called to gapfill surrogates.
